question: Which female politician and aristocrat said ‘I married beneath me, all women do’?
api_result: The quote "I married beneath me, all women do" is attributed to Nancy Astor, Viscountess Astor. She was the first woman to take her seat as a Member of Parliament (MP) in the British House of Commons, representing the Conservative Party. Nancy Astor was known for her sharp wit and strong opinions, making her a notable figure in British politics.
